title: IFSP event organization system
description: Web interface for managing and organizing academic events using React.js.
about: This project was developed to streamline event organization within IFSP, allowing for registration management and schedule visualization through a modern interface.

contributions.text: Development of the user interface using React.js, focusing on fluid navigation for participants.
Creation of reusable components for event listings and registration forms.
Teamwork using Git for versioning, ensuring the integration of system functionalities.
